segments.text: Excuse me . May I see Mrs . Smith ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's me . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice to meet you , Mrs . Smith . I'm coming here for an interview by appointment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice to meet you , too . Did you have any difficulty finding our company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really , I am familiar with this area .
segments.speaker: S1
